text: man-il neohoega geunyeodeulgwa dongchimhaji anihago jichamgeum-eul gyeoljeonghan hu ihon-eul haessdamyeon gyeoljeongdoen jichamgeum ui jeolban-eul jibulhaeya doegeoneul geuleo na yeoseong-ina bohojaga yongseohanda myeon je-oela ttohan geu yongseoneun jeong-uie gajang gakkaun geos-igeoneul yangja sai e seologa gwandae hal geos-eul ij-jimalla hananimkkeseo neohoega haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesim-ila
